speaker: RICHMOND
text_entry: Two households, both alike in dignity,

speaker: RICHMOND
text_entry: In fair Verona, where we lay our scene,

speaker: RICHMOND
text_entry: From ancient grudge break to new mutiny,

speaker: RICHMOND
text_entry: Where civil blood makes civil hands unclean.

speaker: RICHMOND
text_entry: From forth the fatal loins of these two foes

speaker: RICHMOND
text_entry: A pair of star-cross'd lovers take their life;

speaker: RICHMOND
text_entry: Do with their death bury their parents' strife.

speaker: RICHMOND
text_entry: The fearful passage of their death-mark'd love,

speaker: RICHMOND
text_entry: And the continuance of their parents' rage,

speaker: RICHMOND
text_entry: Which, but their children's end, nought could remove,

speaker: RICHMOND
text_entry: Is now the two hours' traffic of our stage;

speaker: RICHMOND
text_entry: The which if you with patient ears attend,

speaker: RICHMOND
text_entry: What here shall miss, our toil shall strive to mend.
